mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECORD VALUES( RECORD_SEQ.nextval, #{member_idx}, sysdate, #{pt_idx}, #{routine_memo}, #{routine_name}, #{routine_list_idx} )
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(RECORD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS record_date FROM RECORD WHERE MEMBER_IDX = #{memberIdx} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(RECORD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY record_date DESC
